query.q: M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`) AS `事务数`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `group` = '#{group}' and `meter` = 'counter' } BY `status`, `group`

eval(A+B+C, A="SERIES_SUM(\"M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}'  and `group` = '#{group}' and `meter` = 'counter' and `role` = 'tc' and `status` = 'committed' } BY `host`,`group`\")", B="SERIES_SUM(\"M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}'  and `group` = '#{group}' and `meter` = 'counter' and `role` = 'tc' and `status` = 'active' } BY `host`,`group`\")", C="SERIES_SUM(\"M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}'  and `group` = '#{group}' and `meter` = 'counter' and `role` = 'tc' and `status` = 'rollbacked' } BY `host`,`group`\")")

charts.name: 当前周期已提交事务数

query.q: SERIES_SUM("M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `group` = '#{group}' and `meter` = 'summary' and `role` = 'tc' and `status` = 'committed' and `statistic` = 'count' and `group` = '#{group}' } BY `host`,`group`")

charts.name: 当前周期内提交/回滚的事务TPS

query.q: M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `meter` = 'summary' and `role` = 'tc' and `statistic` = 'tps' and `group` = '#{group}' } BY `status`, `group`

charts.name: 当前周期内提交/回滚的事务最大耗时

query.q: M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `meter` = 'timer' and `role` = 'tc' and `statistic` = 'max' and `group` = '#{group}' } BY `status`, `group`

charts.name: 当前周期已回滚事务数

query.q: SERIES_SUM("M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `group` = '#{group}' and `meter` = 'summary' and `role` = 'tc' and `status` = 'rollbacked' and `statistic` = 'count' and `group` = '#{group}' } BY `host`, `group`")

SERIES_SUM("M::`seata_seata`:(AVG(`transaction`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `group` = '#{group}' and `meter` = 'summary' and `role` = 'tc' and `statistic` = 'tps' and `group` = '#{group}' } BY `host`, `group`")
